00058 BOOLEAN GetMouseRecalcAndShowAPFlags( UINT32 *puiCursorFlags, BOOLEAN *pfShowAPs )
00059 {
00060       UINT32                                    uiCursorFlags;
00061       static                              BOOLEAN                                   fDoNewTile = FALSE;
00062       BOOLEAN                                   fRecalc = FALSE;
00063       BOOLEAN                                   fShowAPs = FALSE;
00064 
00065       // SET FLAGS FOR CERTAIN MOUSE MOVEMENTS
00066       GetCursorMovementFlags( &uiCursorFlags );
00067 
00068       // Force if we are currently cycling guys...
00069       if ( gfUIForceReExamineCursorData )
00070   {
00071             fDoNewTile = TRUE;
00072             fRecalc    = TRUE;
00073             gfUIForceReExamineCursorData = FALSE;
00074   }
00075 
00076       // IF CURSOR IS MOVING
00077       if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING )
00078       {
00079                   // IF CURSOR WAS PREVIOUSLY STATIONARY, MAKE THE ADDITIONAL CHECK OF GRID POS CHANGE
00080                   //if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING_NEW_TILE )
00081                   {
00082                         // Reset counter
00083                         RESETCOUNTER( PATHFINDCOUNTER );
00084                         fDoNewTile = TRUE;
00085                   }
00086        }
00087 
00088        if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_STATIONARY )
00089        {
00090                   // ONLY DIPSLAY APS AFTER A DELAY
00091                   if ( COUNTERDONE( PATHFINDCOUNTER ) )
00092                   {
00093                         // Don't reset counter: One when we move again do we do this!
00094                         fShowAPs = TRUE;
00095 
00096                         if ( fDoNewTile )
00097                         {
00098                               fDoNewTile = FALSE;
00099                               fRecalc    = TRUE;
00100                         }
00101 
00102                   }
00103                   
00104        }
00105 
00106        if ( puiCursorFlags )
00107        {
00108                   (*puiCursorFlags) = uiCursorFlags;
00109        }
00110 
00111        if ( pfShowAPs )
00112        {
00113                   (*pfShowAPs) = fShowAPs;
00114        }
00115 
00116        return( fRecalc );
00117 }

00120 // FUNCTIONS FOR CURSOR DETERMINATION!
00121 UINT8 GetProperItemCursor( UINT8 ubSoldierID, UINT16 ubItemIndex, UINT16 usMapPos, BOOLEAN fActivated )
00122 {
00123       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
00124       UINT32                                    uiCursorFlags;
00125       BOOLEAN                                   fShowAPs = FALSE;
00126       BOOLEAN                                   fRecalc = FALSE;
00127       INT16                                     sTargetGridNo = usMapPos;
00128       UINT8                                     ubCursorID=0;
00129       UINT8                                     ubItemCursor;
00130 
00131       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
00132 
00133       fRecalc = GetMouseRecalcAndShowAPFlags( &uiCursorFlags, &fShowAPs );
00134 
00135       // ATE: Update attacking weapon!
00136       // CC has added this attackingWeapon stuff and I need to update it constantly for
00137       // CTGH algorithms
00138       if ( gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount == 0 && Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
00139       {
00140             pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
00141       }
00142 
00143       // Calculate target gridno!
00144       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
00145       {
00146             sTargetGridNo = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
00147       }
00148       else
00149       {
00150             sTargetGridNo = usMapPos;
00151       }
00152 
00153 
00154       ubItemCursor  =  GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier );
00155 
00156       switch( ubItemCursor )
00157       {
00158             case PUNCHCURS:
00159 
00160                   // Determine whether gray or red!
00161                   ubCursorID = HandlePunchCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fActivated, uiCursorFlags );
00162                   break;
00163 
00164             case KNIFECURS:
00165                   //Madd: quick hack to make wirecutter cursor appear when using a knife that can cut through wire
00166                   if ( Item[ubItemIndex].wirecutters && IsCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( sTargetGridNo ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
00167                   {
00168                         ubCursorID = GOOD_WIRECUTTER_UICURSOR;
00169                   }
00170                   else
00171                         ubCursorID = HandleKnifeCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fActivated, uiCursorFlags );
00172                   break;
00173 
00174             case AIDCURS:
00175 
00176                   ubCursorID =  HandleAidCursor( pSoldier, usMapPos, fActivated, uiCursorFlags );
00177                   break;
00178 
00179             case TARGETCURS:
00180 
00181                   // Set merc glow script
00182                   SetMercGlowFast( );
00183 
00184                   if ( fActivated )
00185                   {
00186                         ubCursorID = HandleActivatedTargetCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fShowAPs, fRecalc, uiCursorFlags );
00187                   }
00188                   else
00189                   {
00190                         ubCursorID = HandleNonActivatedTargetCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fShowAPs, fRecalc, uiCursorFlags );
00191                   }
00192 
00193 
00194                   // ATE: Only do this if we are in combat!
00195                   if ( gCurrentUIMode == ACTION_MODE && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00196                   {
00197                         // Alrighty, let's change the cursor!
00198                         if ( fRecalc && gfUIFullTargetFound )
00199                         {
00200                                     // ATE: Check for ammo
00201                                     if ( IsValidTargetMerc( (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID ) && EnoughAmmo( pSoldier, FALSE, HANDPOS ) )
00202                                     {
00203                                            // IF it's an ememy, goto confirm action mode
00204                                            if ( ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & ENEMY_MERC ) && ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & VISIBLE_MERC ) && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & DEAD_MERC ) && !gfCannotGetThrough )
00205                                            {
00206                                                       guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_CONFIM_ACTION;
00207                                            }
00208                                            
00209                                     }
00210                         } 
00211                   }
00212                   break;
00213 
00214             case TOSSCURS:
00215             case TRAJECTORYCURS:
00216 
00217                   if ( fActivated )
00218                   {
00219         if ( !gfUIHandlePhysicsTrajectory )
00220         {
00221                           ubCursorID =  HandleNonActivatedTossCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fRecalc, uiCursorFlags, ubItemCursor );
00222         }
00223         else
00224         {
00225                           ubCursorID = HandleActivatedTossCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, ubItemCursor );
00226         }
00227                   }
00228                   else
00229                   {
00230                         ubCursorID =  HandleNonActivatedTossCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fRecalc, uiCursorFlags, ubItemCursor );
00231                   }
00232 
00233 #if 0
00234                   if ( gCurrentUIMode == ACTION_MODE && ubItemCursor == TRAJECTORYCURS && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00235                   {
00236                         // Alrighty, let's change the cursor!
00237                         if ( fRecalc && gfUIFullTargetFound )
00238                         {
00239                                     // ATE: Check for ammo
00240                                     if ( IsValidTargetMerc( (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID ) && EnoughAmmo( pSoldier, FALSE, HANDPOS ) )
00241                                     {
00242                                            // IF it's an ememy, goto confirm action mode
00243                                            if ( ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & ENEMY_MERC ) && ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & VISIBLE_MERC ) && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & DEAD_MERC ) && !gfCannotGetThrough )
00244                                            {
00245                                                       guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_CONFIM_ACTION;
00246                                            }
00247                                            
00248                                     }
00249                         } 
00250                   }
00251 #endif
00252                   break;
00253 
00254             case BOMBCURS:
00255 
00256                   ubCursorID = HandleBombCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fActivated, uiCursorFlags );
00257                   break;
00258 
00259             case REMOTECURS:
00260 
00261                   ubCursorID = HandleRemoteCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fActivated, uiCursorFlags );
00262                   break;
00263 
00264             case WIRECUTCURS:
00265 
00266                   ubCursorID = HandleWirecutterCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, uiCursorFlags );
00267                   break;
00268 
00269 
00270             case REPAIRCURS:
00271 
00272                   ubCursorID = HandleRepairCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, uiCursorFlags );
00273                   break;
00274 
00275             case JARCURS:
00276 
00277                   ubCursorID = HandleJarCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, uiCursorFlags );
00278                   break;
00279             
00280             case TINCANCURS:
00281 
00282                   ubCursorID = HandleTinCanCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, uiCursorFlags );
00283                   break;
00284 
00285             case REFUELCURS:
00286 
00287                   ubCursorID = HandleRefuelCursor( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, uiCursorFlags );
00288                   break;
00289 
00290             case INVALIDCURS:
00291 
00292                   ubCursorID =  INVALID_ACTION_UICURSOR;          
00293                   break;
00294 
00295       }
00296 
00297       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00298       {
00299             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
00300             {
00301                   PauseRT( TRUE );
00302             }
00303             else
00304             {
00305                   PauseRT( FALSE );
00306             }
00307       }
00308 
00309 
00310       return( ubCursorID );
00311 }

00314 // WANNE 4: Zeigt den Schusscursor, wenn dieser auf einem Gegner steht
00315 UINT8 HandleActivatedTargetCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos, BOOLEAN fShowAPs, BOOLEAN fRecalc, UINT32 uiCursorFlags )
00316 {
00317       UINT8                                     switchVal;
00318       BOOLEAN                                         fEnoughPoints = TRUE;
00319       UINT8                                     bFutureAim;
00320       INT16                                     sAPCosts;
00321       INT16                                     sAPCostsMin;
00322       UINT16                                          usCursor=0;
00323       BOOLEAN                                         fMaxPointLimitHit = FALSE;
00324       UINT16                                          usInHand;
00325 
00326       UINT16      reverse = 0;
00327 
00328       UINT8 maxAimLevels = AllowedAimingLevels(pSoldier);
00329 
00330             usInHand = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
00331       
00332             if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass != IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
00333             {
00334                   // If we are in realtime, follow!
00335                   if ( ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
00336                   {
00337                         if ( ( gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY ) )
00338                         {                       
00339                               if ( gUITargetShotWaiting )
00340                               {
00341                                     guiPendingOverrideEvent = CA_MERC_SHOOT;
00342                               }
00343                         }
00344 
00345                         //SoldierFollowGridNo( pSoldier, usMapPos );
00346                   }
00347 
00348                   // Check if we are reloading
00349                   if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
00350                   {
00351                         if ( pSoldier->fReloading || pSoldier->fPauseAim )
00352                         {
00353                               return( ACTION_TARGET_RELOADING );
00354                         }
00355 
00356                   }
00357             }
00358 
00359 
00360             // Determine where we are shooting / aiming
00361             //if ( fRecalc )
00362             {
00363                   DetermineCursorBodyLocation( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier, TRUE, TRUE );
00364             }
00365 
00366             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00367             {
00368                   if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire)
00369                   {
00370                         if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire == 1) //try to maximize the # of bullets because 1 may not be optimal
00371                         {
00372                               INT16 sCurAPCosts, sAPCosts;
00373 
00374                               sCurAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, 0);
00375 
00376                               do
00377                               {
00378                                     pSoldier->bDoAutofire++;
00379                                     sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, 0);
00380                               }
00381                               while(EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) && sAPCosts == sCurAPCosts && pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft >= pSoldier->bDoAutofire);
00382                               pSoldier->bDoAutofire--;
00383                         }
00384 
00385                         gfUIAutofireBulletCount = TRUE;
00386                         gsBulletCount = pSoldier->bDoAutofire;
00387                         gsTotalBulletCount = pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft;
00388 
00389                         if(pSoldier->autofireLastStep) //set the orange tint on the numbers if we at the last step
00390                               gTintBulletCounts = TRUE;
00391                         else
00392                               gTintBulletCounts = FALSE;
00393 
00394                   }
00395                   else
00396                         gfUIAutofireBulletCount = FALSE;
00397 
00398                   gsCurrentActionPoints = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
00399                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
00400                   gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
00401 
00402                   
00403                   while(!EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0 , FALSE ) && pSoldier->bDoAutofire > 1) //oops, we don't have enough points if we are in auto-fire try to decrease bulletcount
00404                   {
00405                         pSoldier->bDoAutofire--;
00406                         gsCurrentActionPoints = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
00407                   }
00408 
00409                   // If we don't have any points and we are at the first refine, do nothing but warn!
00410                   if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0 , FALSE ) )
00411                   {
00412                         gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
00413 
00414                         fMaxPointLimitHit = TRUE;
00415                   }
00416                   else
00417                   {
00418                         // WANNE 4: Wie oft erhht?
00419                         bFutureAim = (INT8)( pSoldier->bShownAimTime + 1 );
00420 
00421                         if ( bFutureAim <= maxAimLevels )
00422                         {
00423                               if (reverse == 0)
00424                               {
00425                                     // WANNE 4: Aktuelle AP Kosten frs ziehlen
00426                                     sAPCosts = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE ) + ( bFutureAim  );
00427 
00428                                     //gsCurrentActionPoints = sAPCosts;
00429 
00430                                     // Determine if we can afford!
00431                                     if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, (INT16)sAPCosts, 0 , FALSE ) )
00432                                     {
00433                                           fEnoughPoints = FALSE;
00434                                     }
00435                               }
00436                               else
00437                               {
00438                                     sAPCosts = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE ) + maxAimLevels - (bFutureAim + 1);
00439 
00440                                     gsCurrentActionPoints = sAPCosts;
00441 
00442                                     sAPCostsMin = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE );
00443                                     if (sAPCosts < sAPCostsMin)
00444                                     {
00445                                           fEnoughPoints = FALSE;
00446                                     }
00447                               }
00448 
00449                               //// Determine if we can afford!
00450                               //if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, (INT16)sAPCosts, 0 , FALSE ) )
00451                               //{
00452                               //    fEnoughPoints = FALSE;
00453                               //}
00454 
00455                         }
00456                         
00457                   }
00458             }
00459 
00460             if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
00461             {
00462                   if ( !pSoldier->fPauseAim )
00463                   {
00464                         if ( COUNTERDONE( TARGETREFINE )  )
00465                         {
00466                               // Reset counter
00467                               RESETCOUNTER( TARGETREFINE );
00468 
00469                               if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
00470                               {
00471                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_AIM_BURST;
00472                               }
00473                               else
00474                               {
00475                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime++;
00476 
00477                                     if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime > maxAimLevels )
00478                                     {
00479                                           pSoldier->bShownAimTime = maxAimLevels;
00480                                     }
00481                                     else
00482                                     {
00483                                           if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime % 2 )
00484                                           {
00485                                                 PlayJA2Sample( TARG_REFINE_BEEP, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                                     
00486                                           }
00487                                     }
00488                               }
00489                         }
00490                   }
00491             }
00492 
00493             if ( fRecalc )
00494             {
00495                   if ( gusUIFullTargetID != NOBODY )
00496                   {
00497                         if ( SoldierToSoldierBodyPartChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ], pSoldier->bAimShotLocation ) < OK_CHANCE_TO_GET_THROUGH )
00498                         {
00499                               gfCannotGetThrough = TRUE;
00500                         }
00501                         else
00502                         {
00503                               gfCannotGetThrough = FALSE;
00504                         }
00505                   }
00506                   else
00507                   {
00508                         if ( SoldierToLocationChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, usMapPos, (INT8) gsInterfaceLevel, pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel, NOBODY ) < OK_CHANCE_TO_GET_THROUGH )
00509                         {
00510                               gfCannotGetThrough = TRUE;
00511                         }
00512                         else
00513                         {
00514                               gfCannotGetThrough = FALSE;
00515                         }
00516                   }
00517             }
00518 
00519             // OK, if we begin to move, reset the cursor...
00520             if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING )
00521             {
00522                   //gfCannotGetThrough = FALSE;
00523             }
00524 
00525             if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread && pSoldier->bDoAutofire) //approximate spread-auto costs
00526             {
00527                   if(gbNumBurstLocations > pSoldier->bDoAutofire)
00528                   {
00529                         INT16 sAPCosts;
00530       
00531                         do
00532                         {
00533                               pSoldier->bDoAutofire++;
00534                               sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, gsBurstLocations[0].sGridNo, TRUE, 0);
00535                         }
00536                         while(EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) && pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft >= pSoldier->bDoAutofire && gbNumBurstLocations >= pSoldier->bDoAutofire);
00537                         pSoldier->bDoAutofire--;
00538 
00539                         gsCurrentActionPoints = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, gsBurstLocations[0].sGridNo, TRUE, 0 );
00540                   }
00541             }
00542 
00543             if ( fMaxPointLimitHit )
00544             {
00545                   // Check if we're in burst mode!
00546                   if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
00547                   {
00548                         usCursor = ACTION_TARGETREDBURST_UICURSOR;
00549                   }
00550                   else if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
00551                   {
00552                         usCursor = RED_THROW_UICURSOR;
00553                   }
00554                   else
00555                   {                                   
00556                         usCursor = ACTION_TARGETRED_UICURSOR;
00557                   }
00558             }
00559             else if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
00560             {
00561                   if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread )
00562                   {
00563                         usCursor = ACTION_TARGETREDBURST_UICURSOR;                  
00564                   }
00565                   else
00566                   {
00567                         usCursor = ACTION_TARGETCONFIRMBURST_UICURSOR;
00568 
00569                         if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire == 0 && gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_CTH_CURSOR ])
00570                         {
00571                               UINT32 uiHitChance;
00572                               uiHitChance = CalcChanceToHitGun( pSoldier, usMapPos, 0, pSoldier->bAimShotLocation );
00573 
00574                               gfUICtHBar = TRUE;
00575                               gbCtH = (gbCtH+uiHitChance)/2;
00576                         }
00577                   }
00578             }
00579             else
00580             {
00581                   //DIGICRAB: Graphical CtH
00582                   if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_CTH_CURSOR ])
00583                   {
00584                         UINT32 uiHitChance;
00585                         uiHitChance = CalcChanceToHitGun( pSoldier, usMapPos, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ), pSoldier->bAimShotLocation );
00586 
00587                         gfUICtHBar = TRUE;
00588                         gbCtH = (gbCtH+uiHitChance)/2;
00589                   }
00590                   
00591                   switchVal = pSoldier->bShownAimTime;
00592

00594                   {

00598                               {
00599                                     if ( gfDisplayFullCountRing )
00600                                     {

00602                                     }
00603                                     else if ( fEnoughPoints )
00604                                     {
00605                                           usCursor = ACTION_THROWAIM1_UICURSOR;
00606                                     }
00607                                     else
00608                                     {
00609                                           usCursor = ACTION_THROWAIMCANT1_UICURSOR;
00610                                     }
00611                               }
00612                               else
00613                               {
00614                                     if ( gfDisplayFullCountRing )
00615                                     {
00616                                           usCursor = ACTION_TARGETAIMYELLOW1_UICURSOR;
00617                                     }
00618                                     else if ( fEnoughPoints )
00619                                     {
00620                                           usCursor = ACTION_TARGETAIM1_UICURSOR;
00621                                     }
00622                                     else
00623                                     {

00625                                     }
00626                               }
00627                               break;

00911                   // Remove flash flag!
00912                   RemoveCursorFlags( gUICursors[ usCursor ].usFreeCursorName, CURSOR_TO_FLASH );
00913                   RemoveCursorFlags( gUICursors[ usCursor ].usFreeCursorName, CURSOR_TO_PLAY_SOUND );
00914 
00915                   if ( gfCannotGetThrough  )
00916                   {
00917                         SetCursorSpecialFrame( gUICursors[ usCursor ].usFreeCursorName, 1 );
00918                   }
00919                   else
00920                   {
00921                         if ( !InRange( pSoldier, usMapPos ) )
00922                         {
00923                               // OK, make buddy flash!
00924                               SetCursorFlags( gUICursors[ usCursor ].usFreeCursorName, CURSOR_TO_FLASH );
00925                               SetCursorFlags( gUICursors[ usCursor ].usFreeCursorName, CURSOR_TO_PLAY_SOUND );
00926                         }
00927                         else
00928                         {
00929                               SetCursorSpecialFrame( gUICursors[ usCursor ].usFreeCursorName, 0 );
00930                         }
00931                   }
00932             }
00933             return( (UINT8)usCursor );
00934 }

00937 
00938 // WANNE 4: Zeigt den Schusscursor, wenn dieser auf keinem Gegner steht
00939 UINT8 HandleNonActivatedTargetCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos , BOOLEAN fShowAPs, BOOLEAN fRecalc, UINT32 uiCursorFlags  )
00940 {
00941   UINT16                      usInHand;
00942 
00943       usInHand = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
00944 
00945       if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass != IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
00946       {
00947             if (( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
00948             {
00949                   //DetermineCursorBodyLocation( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier, FALSE, fRecalc );
00950                   DetermineCursorBodyLocation( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier, fShowAPs, fRecalc );
00951 
00952                   if ( pSoldier->fReloading || pSoldier->fPauseAim )
00953                   {
00954                         return( ACTION_TARGET_RELOADING );
00955                   }
00956             }     
00957 
00958             // Check for enough ammo...
00959             if ( !EnoughAmmo( pSoldier, FALSE, HANDPOS ) )
00960             {
00961                   // Check if ANY ammo exists.....
00962                   if ( FindAmmoToReload( pSoldier, HANDPOS, NO_SLOT ) == NO_SLOT )
00963                   {
00964                         // OK, use BAD reload cursor.....
00965                         return( BAD_RELOAD_UICURSOR );      
00966                   }
00967                   else
00968                   {
00969                         // Check APs to reload...
00970                         gsCurrentActionPoints = GetAPsToAutoReload( pSoldier );
00971 
00972                         gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
00973                         //gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 14;
00974                         //gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 7;
00975 
00976                         // OK, use GOOD reload cursor.....
00977                         return( GOOD_RELOAD_UICURSOR );     
00978                   }
00979             }
00980       }
00981 
00982       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00983       {
00984             DetermineCursorBodyLocation( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier, fShowAPs, fRecalc );
00985 
00986             gsCurrentActionPoints = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
00987 
00988             gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
00989             gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
00990 
00991             if ( fShowAPs )
00992             {
00993                   if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0 , FALSE ) )
00994                   {
00995                         gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
00996                   }
00997             }
00998             else
00999             {
01000                   //gfUIDisplayActionPointsBlack = TRUE;
01001                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
01002             }
01003 
01004       }
01005 
01006       if(gusUIFullTargetID == NOBODY && pSoldier->bDoAutofire && !pSoldier->fDoSpread)  //reset autofire if we move the mouse off the target, however don't reset it if we are spread-bursting
01007       {
01008             if(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ))
01009                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;
01010             else
01011                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 6;
01012 
01013             pSoldier->autofireLastStep = FALSE;
01014       }
01015 
01016       //if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01017       {
01018             if ( fRecalc )
01019             {
01020                   if ( SoldierToLocationChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, usMapPos, (INT8) gsInterfaceLevel, pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel, NOBODY  ) < OK_CHANCE_TO_GET_THROUGH )
01021                   {
01022                         gfCannotGetThrough = TRUE;
01023                   }
01024                   else
01025                   {
01026                         gfCannotGetThrough = FALSE;
01027                   }
01028             }
01029 
01030             // OK, if we begin to move, reset the cursor...
01031             if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING )
01032             {
01033                   gfCannotGetThrough = FALSE;
01034             }
01035       
01036             if ( gfCannotGetThrough )
01037             {
01038                   if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01039                   {
01040                         return(  ACTION_NOCHANCE_BURST_UICURSOR );
01041                   }
01042                   else if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01043                   {
01044                         return(  BAD_THROW_UICURSOR );
01045                   }
01046                   else
01047                   {
01048                         return(  ACTION_NOCHANCE_SHOOT_UICURSOR );
01049                   }
01050             }
01051       }
01052 
01053       // Determine if good range
01054       if ( !InRange( pSoldier, usMapPos ) )
01055       {
01056             // Flash cursor!
01057             // Check if we're in burst mode!
01058             if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01059             {
01060                   return(  FLASH_THROW_UICURSOR );
01061             }
01062             else if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01063             {
01064                   //return( ACTION_FIRSTAID_RED );
01065                   return(  ACTION_FLASH_BURST_UICURSOR );
01066             }
01067             else
01068             {                                   
01069                   //return( ACTION_FIRSTAID_RED );
01070                   return( ACTION_FLASH_SHOOT_UICURSOR );
01071             }
01072       }
01073       else
01074       {
01075             // Check if we're in burst mode!
01076             if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01077             {
01078                   return(  GOOD_THROW_UICURSOR );
01079             }
01080             else if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01081             {
01082                   //return( ACTION_FIRSTAID_RED );
01083                   return( ACTION_TARGETBURST_UICURSOR );
01084             }
01085             else
01086             {                                   
01087                   //return( ACTION_FIRSTAID_RED );
01088                   return( ACTION_SHOOT_UICURSOR );
01089             }
01090 
01091       }
01092 
01093 }
01094 
01095 
01096 void DetermineCursorBodyLocation( UINT8 ubSoldierID, BOOLEAN fDisplay, BOOLEAN fRecalc )
01097 {
01098       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
01099       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTargetSoldier = NULL, *pSoldier;
01100       UINT16      usFlags;
01101       INT16 sMouseX, sMouseY, sCellX, sCellY, sScreenX, sScreenY;
01102       BOOLEAN     fOnGuy = FALSE;
01103       LEVELNODE         *pNode;
01104 
01105       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
01106 
01107       if ( gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount > 0 )
01108       {
01109             // ATE: Return if attacker busy count > 0, this
01110             // helps in RT with re-setting the flag to random...
01111             return;
01112       }
01113 
01114       if ( fRecalc )
01115       {
01116             // ALWAYS SET AIM LOCATION TO NOTHING
01117             pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_RANDOM;
01118 
01119             if( !GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos) )
01120             {
01121                   return;
01122             }
01123 
01124             // Determine which body part it's on
01125             pNode = GetAnimProfileFlags( usMapPos, &usFlags, &pTargetSoldier, NULL );
01126 
01127             while( pNode != NULL )
01128             {
01129                   if ( pTargetSoldier != NULL )
01130                   {
01131                         // ATE: Check their stance - if prone - return!
01132                         if ( gAnimControl[ pTargetSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
01133                         {
01134                               return;
01135                         }
01136 
01137                         fOnGuy = TRUE;
01138 
01139                         // Check if we have a half tile profile 
01140                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_NORTH_HALF )
01141                         {
01142                               // Check if we are in north half of tile!
01143                               GetMouseXYWithRemainder( &sMouseX, &sMouseY, &sCellX, &sCellY );
01144 
01145                               if ( sCellY > (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2) )
01146                               {
01147                                     fOnGuy = FALSE;
01148                               }
01149                         }
01150                         // Check if we have a half tile profile 
01151                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_SOUTH_HALF )
01152                         {
01153                               // Check if we are in north half of tile!
01154                               GetMouseXYWithRemainder( &sMouseX, &sMouseY, &sCellX, &sCellY );
01155 
01156                               if ( sCellY <= (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2) )
01157                               {
01158                                     fOnGuy = FALSE;
01159                               }
01160                         }
01161                         // Check if we have a half tile profile 
01162                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_WEST_HALF )
01163                         {
01164                               // Check if we are in north half of tile!
01165                               GetMouseXYWithRemainder( &sMouseX, &sMouseY, &sCellX, &sCellY );
01166 
01167                               if ( sCellX > (CELL_X_SIZE / 2) )
01168                               {
01169                                     fOnGuy = FALSE;
01170                               }
01171                         }
01172                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_EAST_HALF )
01173                         {
01174                               // Check if we are in north half of tile!
01175                               GetMouseXYWithRemainder( &sMouseX, &sMouseY, &sCellX, &sCellY );
01176 
01177                               if ( sCellX <= (CELL_X_SIZE / 2) )
01178                               {
01179                                     fOnGuy = FALSE;
01180                               }
01181                         }
01182                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_TOP_HALF )
01183                         {
01184                               // Check if we are in north half of tile!
01185                               GetMouseXYWithRemainder( &sMouseX, &sMouseY, &sCellX, &sCellY );
01186 
01187                               // Convert these to screen corrdinates
01188                               FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sCellX, sCellY, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
01189 
01190                               // Check for Below...
01191                               if ( sScreenX > (WORLD_TILE_Y / 2) )
01192                               {
01193                                     fOnGuy = FALSE;
01194                               }
01195                         }
01196                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_BOTTOM_HALF )
01197                         {
01198                               // Check if we are in north half of tile!
01199                               GetMouseXYWithRemainder( &sMouseX, &sMouseY, &sCellX, &sCellY );
01200 
01201                               // Convert these to screen corrdinates
01202                               FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sCellX, sCellY, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
01203 
01204                               // Check for Below...
01205                               if ( sScreenX <= (WORLD_TILE_Y / 2) )
01206                               {
01207                                     fOnGuy = FALSE;
01208                               }
01209                         }
01210 
01211             
01212                         // Check if mouse is iin bounding box of soldier
01213                         if ( !IsPointInSoldierBoundingBox( pTargetSoldier, gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos ) )
01214                         {
01215                               fOnGuy = FALSE;
01216                         }
01217                   }
01218 
01219                   if ( fOnGuy )
01220                         break;
01221 
01222                   pNode = GetAnimProfileFlags( usMapPos, &usFlags, &pTargetSoldier, pNode );
01223 
01224             }
01225 
01226 
01227             if ( !fOnGuy )
01228             {
01229                   // Check if we can find a soldier here
01230                   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01231                   {
01232                          pTargetSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
01233 
01234                          if ( FindRelativeSoldierPosition( pTargetSoldier, &usFlags, gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos )  )
01235                          {
01236                                     fOnGuy = TRUE;
01237                          }
01238                   }
01239 
01240             }
01241 
01242 
01243             if ( fOnGuy )
01244             {
01245                   if ( IsValidTargetMerc( pTargetSoldier->ubID ) )
01246                   {     
01247                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_FEET )
01248                         {
01249                               pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_LEGS;
01250                         }
01251                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_MID )
01252                         {
01253                               pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
01254                         }
01255                         if ( usFlags & TILE_FLAG_HEAD )
01256                         {
01257                               pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
01258                         }
01259                   }
01260             }
01261 
01262       }
01263 
01264       if ( fDisplay && !pSoldier->bDoBurst)
01265       {
01266             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01267             {
01268                   pTargetSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
01269 
01270                   if ( pTargetSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
01271                   {
01272                         pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_LEGS;
01273 
01274                         wcscpy( gzLocation, TacticalStr[ CROW_HIT_LOCATION_STR ] );
01275 
01276                         gfUIBodyHitLocation = TRUE;
01277                         return;
01278                   }
01279 
01280                   if ( !IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pTargetSoldier ) )
01281                   {
01282                         return;
01283                   }
01284 
01285                   switch( pSoldier->bAimShotLocation )
01286                   {
01287                         case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
01288 
01289                               // If we have a knife in hand, change string
01290                               if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_BLADE )
01291                               {
01292                                     wcscpy( gzLocation, TacticalStr[ NECK_HIT_LOCATION_STR ] );
01293                               }
01294                               else
01295                               {
01296                                     wcscpy( gzLocation, TacticalStr[ HEAD_HIT_LOCATION_STR ] );
01297                               }
01298                               gfUIBodyHitLocation = TRUE;
01299                               break;
01300 
01301                         case AIM_SHOT_TORSO:
01302                               wcscpy( gzLocation, TacticalStr[ TORSO_HIT_LOCATION_STR ] );
01303                               gfUIBodyHitLocation = TRUE;
01304                               break;
01305 
01306                         case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
01307                               wcscpy( gzLocation, TacticalStr[ LEGS_HIT_LOCATION_STR ] );
01308                               gfUIBodyHitLocation = TRUE;
01309                               break;
01310                   }
01311             }
01312       }
01313 }
01314 
01315 
01316 UINT8 HandleKnifeCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fActivated, UINT32 uiCursorFlags )
01317 {
01318       INT16                                     sAPCosts;
01319       INT8                                      bFutureAim;
01320       BOOLEAN                                   fEnoughPoints = TRUE;
01321 
01322       // DRAW PATH TO GUY
01323       HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCS );
01324 
01325       if ( fActivated )
01326       {
01327             DetermineCursorBodyLocation( pSoldier->ubID, TRUE, TRUE );
01328 
01329             if ( gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid )
01330             {
01331                   gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = 2;
01332             }
01333 
01334             // Calculate action points
01335             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01336             {
01337                   gsCurrentActionPoints = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
01338                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
01339                   gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
01340 
01341                   // If we don't have any points and we are at the first refine, do nothing but warn!
01342                   if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0 , FALSE ) )
01343                   {
01344                         gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
01345 
01346                         if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime == REFINE_KNIFE_1 )
01347                         {
01348                               return( KNIFE_HIT_UICURSOR );
01349                         }
01350                   }
01351 
01352                   bFutureAim = (INT8)( REFINE_KNIFE_2 );
01353 
01354                   sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)(bFutureAim / 2) );
01355 
01356                   // Determine if we can afford!
01357                   if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, (INT16)sAPCosts, 0 , FALSE ) )
01358                   {
01359                         fEnoughPoints = FALSE;
01360                   }
01361 
01362             }
01363 
01364             if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
01365             {
01366                   if ( !pSoldier->fPauseAim )
01367                   {
01368                         if ( COUNTERDONE( NONGUNTARGETREFINE )  )
01369                         {
01370                               // Reset counter
01371                               RESETCOUNTER( NONGUNTARGETREFINE );
01372 
01373                               if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime == REFINE_KNIFE_1 )
01374                               {
01375                                     PlayJA2Sample( TARG_REFINE_BEEP, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                                     
01376                               }
01377 
01378                               pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_KNIFE_2;
01379 
01380                         }
01381                   }
01382             }
01383 
01384 
01385             switch( pSoldier->bShownAimTime )
01386             {
01387                   case REFINE_KNIFE_1:
01388 
01389                         if ( gfDisplayFullCountRing )
01390                         {
01391                               return( KNIFE_YELLOW_AIM1_UICURSOR );
01392                         }
01393                         else if ( fEnoughPoints )
01394                         {
01395                               return( KNIFE_HIT_AIM1_UICURSOR );
01396                         }
01397                         else
01398                         {
01399                               return( KNIFE_NOGO_AIM1_UICURSOR );
01400                         }
01401                         break;
01402 
01403                   case REFINE_KNIFE_2:
01404 
01405                         if ( gfDisplayFullCountRing )
01406                         {
01407                               return( KNIFE_YELLOW_AIM2_UICURSOR );
01408                         }
01409                         else if ( fEnoughPoints )
01410                         {
01411                               return( KNIFE_HIT_AIM2_UICURSOR );
01412                         }
01413                         else
01414                         {
01415                               return( KNIFE_NOGO_AIM2_UICURSOR );
01416                         }
01417                         break;
01418 
01419                   default:
01420                         Assert( FALSE );
01421                         // no return value!
01422                         return(0);
01423                         break;
01424             }
01425       }
01426       else
01427       {
01428             gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
01429 
01430             // CHECK IF WE ARE ON A GUY ( THAT'S NOT SELECTED )!
01431             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & SELECTED_MERC ) )
01432             {
01433                   DetermineCursorBodyLocation( pSoldier->ubID, TRUE, TRUE );
01434                   return( KNIFE_HIT_UICURSOR );
01435             }
01436             else
01437             {
01438                   return( KNIFE_REG_UICURSOR );
01439             }
01440       }
01441 }
01442 
01443 
01444 UINT8 HandlePunchCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fActivated, UINT32 uiCursorFlags )
01445 {
01446       INT16                                     sAPCosts;
01447       INT8                                      bFutureAim;
01448       BOOLEAN                                   fEnoughPoints = TRUE;
01449 
01450       // DRAW PATH TO GUY
01451       HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCS );
01452 
01453       if ( fActivated )
01454       {
01455             DetermineCursorBodyLocation( pSoldier->ubID, TRUE, TRUE );
01456 
01457             if ( gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid )
01458             {
01459                   gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = 2;
01460             }
01461 
01462             // Calculate action points
01463             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED )
01464             {
01465                   gsCurrentActionPoints = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
01466                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
01467                   gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
01468 
01469                   // If we don't have any points and we are at the first refine, do nothing but warn!
01470                   if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0 , FALSE ) )
01471                   {
01472                         gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
01473 
01474                         if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime == REFINE_PUNCH_1 )
01475                         {
01476                               return( ACTION_PUNCH_RED );
01477                         }
01478                   }
01479 
01480                   bFutureAim = (INT8)( REFINE_PUNCH_2 );
01481 
01482                   sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)(bFutureAim / 2) );
01483 
01484                   // Determine if we can afford!
01485                   if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, (INT16)sAPCosts, 0 , FALSE ) )
01486                   {
01487                         fEnoughPoints = FALSE;
01488                   }
01489 
01490             }
01491 
01492             if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
01493             {
01494                   if ( !pSoldier->fPauseAim )
01495                   {
01496                         if ( COUNTERDONE( NONGUNTARGETREFINE )  )
01497                         {
01498                               // Reset counter
01499                               RESETCOUNTER( NONGUNTARGETREFINE );
01500 
01501                               if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime == REFINE_PUNCH_1 )
01502                               {
01503                                     PlayJA2Sample( TARG_REFINE_BEEP, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                                     
01504                               }
01505 
01506                               pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_PUNCH_2;
01507 
01508                         }
01509                   }
01510             }
01511 
01512             switch( pSoldier->bShownAimTime )
01513             {
01514                   case REFINE_PUNCH_1:
01515 
01516                         if ( gfDisplayFullCountRing )
01517                         {
01518                               return( ACTION_PUNCH_YELLOW_AIM1_UICURSOR );
01519                         }
01520                         else if ( fEnoughPoints )
01521                         {
01522                               return( ACTION_PUNCH_RED_AIM1_UICURSOR );
01523                         }
01524                         else
01525                         {
01526                               return( ACTION_PUNCH_NOGO_AIM1_UICURSOR );
01527                         }
01528                         break;
01529 
01530                   case REFINE_PUNCH_2:
01531 
01532                         if ( gfDisplayFullCountRing )
01533                         {
01534                               return( ACTION_PUNCH_YELLOW_AIM2_UICURSOR );
01535                         }
01536                         else if ( fEnoughPoints )
01537                         {
01538                               return( ACTION_PUNCH_RED_AIM2_UICURSOR );
01539                         }
01540                         else
01541                         {
01542                               return( ACTION_PUNCH_NOGO_AIM2_UICURSOR );
01543                         }
01544                         break;
01545 
01546                   default:
01547                         Assert( FALSE );
01548                         // no return value!
01549                         return(0);
01550                         break;
01551             }
01552       }
01553       else
01554       {
01555             gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
01556 
01557             // CHECK IF WE ARE ON A GUY ( THAT'S NOT SELECTED )!
01558             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & SELECTED_MERC ) )
01559             {
01560                   DetermineCursorBodyLocation( pSoldier->ubID, TRUE, TRUE );
01561                   return( ACTION_PUNCH_RED );
01562             }
01563             else
01564             {
01565                   return( ACTION_PUNCH_GRAY );
01566             }
01567       }
01568 }

01570 UINT8 HandleAidCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fActivated, UINT32 uiCursorFlags )
01571 {
01572       // DRAW PATH TO GUY
01573       HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCSFORAID );
01574 
01575       if ( fActivated )
01576       {
01577             return( ACTION_FIRSTAID_RED );
01578       }
01579       else
01580       {
01581             // CHECK IF WE ARE ON A GUY ( THAT'S NOT SELECTED )!
01582             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound ) // && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & SELECTED_MERC ) )
01583             {
01584                   return( ACTION_FIRSTAID_RED );
01585             }
01586             else
01587             {
01588                   return( ACTION_FIRSTAID_GRAY );
01589             }
01590       }
01591 }

01598 
01599 UINT8 HandleNonActivatedTossCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fRecalc, UINT32 uiCursorFlags, UINT8 ubItemCursor )
01600 {
01601       INT16 sFinalGridNo;
01602       static BOOLEAN fBadCTGH = FALSE;
01603       BOOLEAN fArmed = FALSE;
01604       INT8        bLevel;
01605       OBJECTTYPE  TempObject;
01606       INT8        bSlot;
01607       OBJECTTYPE * pObj;
01608       INT8                    bAttachPos;
01609 
01610 
01611       // Check for enough ammo...
01612       if ( ubItemCursor == TRAJECTORYCURS )
01613       {
01614             fArmed = TRUE;
01615 
01616             if ( !EnoughAmmo( pSoldier, FALSE, HANDPOS ) )
01617             {
01618                   // Check if ANY ammo exists.....
01619                   if ( FindAmmoToReload( pSoldier, HANDPOS, NO_SLOT ) == NO_SLOT )
01620                   {
01621                         // OK, use BAD reload cursor.....
01622                         return( BAD_RELOAD_UICURSOR );      
01623                   }
01624                   else
01625                   {
01626                         // Check APs to reload...
01627                         gsCurrentActionPoints = GetAPsToAutoReload( pSoldier );
01628 
01629                         gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
01630                         //gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 14;
01631                         //gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 7;
01632 
01633                         // OK, use GOOD reload cursor.....
01634                         return( GOOD_RELOAD_UICURSOR );     
01635                   }
01636             }
01637       }
01638 
01639       // Add APs....
01640       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01641       {
01642             if ( ubItemCursor == TRAJECTORYCURS )
01643             {
01644               gsCurrentActionPoints = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
01645             }
01646             else
01647             {
01648                   gsCurrentActionPoints = MinAPsToThrow( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE );
01649             }
01650 
01651             gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
01652             gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
01653 
01654             // If we don't have any points and we are at the first refine, do nothing but warn!
01655             if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0 , FALSE ) )
01656             {
01657                   gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
01658             }
01659       }
01660 
01661 
01662       // OK, if we begin to move, reset the cursor...
01663       if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING )
01664       {
01665             EndPhysicsTrajectoryUI( );
01666       }
01667 
01668       gfUIHandlePhysicsTrajectory = TRUE;
01669 
01670       if ( fRecalc )
01671       {
01672             // Calculate chance to throw here.....
01673             if ( sGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo )
01674             {
01675                   fBadCTGH = FALSE;
01676             }
01677             else
01678             {
01679       // ATE: Find the object to use...
01680       memcpy( &TempObject, &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01681 
01682       // Do we have a launcable?
01683           pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]); 
01684           for (bAttachPos = 0; bAttachPos < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bAttachPos++)
01685           {
01686                 if (pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] != NOTHING)
01687                 {
01688                       if ( Item[ pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV )
01689                       {
01690                             break;
01691                       }
01692                 }
01693           }
01694           if (bAttachPos != MAX_ATTACHMENTS)
01695           {
01696         CreateItem( pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ], pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ], &TempObject );
01697           }
01698 
01699                   UINT16 glItem = GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]));
01700                   if ((pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )&& glItem != NONE )
01701                   {
01702                         bSlot = FindAttachment( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), glItem );
01703 
01704                         if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
01705                         {
01706                               CreateItem( glItem, pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[ bSlot ], &TempObject );
01707 
01708                               if ( !CalculateLaunchItemChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, &TempObject, sGridNo, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel, (INT16)( gsInterfaceLevel * 256 ), &sFinalGridNo, fArmed, &bLevel, TRUE ) )
01709                               {
01710                                     fBadCTGH = TRUE;
01711                               }
01712                               else
01713                               {
01714                                     fBadCTGH = FALSE;
01715                               }
01716                   BeginPhysicsTrajectoryUI( sFinalGridNo, bLevel, fBadCTGH );
01717                         }
01718                   }
01719                   else
01720                   {
01721                         if ( !CalculateLaunchItemChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, &TempObject, sGridNo, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel, (INT16)( gsInterfaceLevel * 256 ), &sFinalGridNo, fArmed, &bLevel, TRUE ) )
01722                         {
01723                               fBadCTGH = TRUE;
01724                         }
01725                         else
01726                         {
01727                               fBadCTGH = FALSE;
01728                         }
01729             BeginPhysicsTrajectoryUI( sFinalGridNo, bLevel, fBadCTGH );
01730                   }
01731             }
01732       }
01733 
01734       if ( fBadCTGH )
01735       {
01736             return( BAD_THROW_UICURSOR );
01737       }
01738       return( GOOD_THROW_UICURSOR );
01739 }
01740

01742 UINT8 HandleWirecutterCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, UINT32 uiCursorFlags )
01743 {
01744       // DRAW PATH TO GUY
01745       HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_WIREFENCE );
01746 
01747       // Are we over a cuttable fence?
01748       if ( IsCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( sGridNo ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
01749       {
01750             return( GOOD_WIRECUTTER_UICURSOR );
01751       }
01752 
01753       return( BAD_WIRECUTTER_UICURSOR );
01754 }

01763       if ( IsRepairableStructAtGridNo( sGridNo, NULL ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )

01793       {
01794             return( GOOD_JAR_UICURSOR );

01796

01801 UINT8 HandleTinCanCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sGridNo, UINT32 uiCursorFlags )
01802 {
01803       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure;
01804   INT16                                         sIntTileGridNo;
01805       LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
01806 
01807 
01808       // DRAW PATH TO GUY
01809       HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_CAN );
01810 
01811       // Check if a door exists here.....
01812       pIntTile = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo, &pStructure );
01813 
01814       // We should not have null here if we are given this flag...
01815       if ( pIntTile != NULL )
01816       {
01817             if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR)
01818             {     
01819                   return( PLACE_TINCAN_GREY_UICURSOR );
01820             }
01821       }
01822 
01823       return( PLACE_TINCAN_RED_UICURSOR );
01824 }

01835             gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
01836             gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
01837

01840             {
01841                   gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
01842             }
01843       }
01844

01892       UINT8                         ubItemCursor;

01904 
01905 void HandleLeftClickCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01906 {
01907       UINT16                        usInHand;
01908       UINT8                         ubItemCursor;
01909       INT16                         sGridNo;
01910 
01911       // LOOK IN GUY'S HAND TO CHECK LOCATION
01912       usInHand = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
01913 
01914       ubItemCursor  =  GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier );
01915 
01916       // OK, if we are i realtime.. goto directly to shoot
01917       if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )//&& ubItemCursor != TOSSCURS && ubItemCursor != TRAJECTORYCURS )
01918       {
01919             // GOTO DIRECTLY TO USING ITEM
01920             // ( only if not burst mode.. )
01921             if ( !pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01922             {
01923                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = CA_MERC_SHOOT;              
01924             }
01925             return;
01926       }
01927 
01928       if (!GetMouseMapPos( &sGridNo ) )
01929       {
01930             return;
01931       }
01932 
01933       gfUIForceReExamineCursorData = TRUE;
01934 
01935       gfDisplayFullCountRing = FALSE;
01936 
01937       switch( ubItemCursor )
01938       {
01939             case TARGETCURS:
01940 
01941                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01942                   {
01943                         pSoldier->bShownAimTime                   = REFINE_AIM_1;
01944                         pSoldier->fPauseAim = FALSE;
01945                   }
01946                   else 
01947                   {
01948                         pSoldier->bShownAimTime                   = REFINE_AIM_1;
01949                         pSoldier->fPauseAim = FALSE;
01950                   }
01951                   // Reset counter
01952                   RESETCOUNTER( TARGETREFINE );
01953                   break;
01954 
01955             case PUNCHCURS:
01956 
01957                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01958                   {
01959                         pSoldier->bShownAimTime                   = REFINE_PUNCH_1;
01960                         pSoldier->fPauseAim = FALSE;
01961                   }
01962                   else 
01963                   {
01964                         pSoldier->bShownAimTime                   = REFINE_PUNCH_1;
01965                         pSoldier->fPauseAim = FALSE;
01966 
01967                   }
01968                   // Reset counter
01969                   RESETCOUNTER( NONGUNTARGETREFINE );
01970                   break;
01971 
01972 
01973             case KNIFECURS:
01974 
01975                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01976                   {
01977                         pSoldier->bShownAimTime                   = REFINE_KNIFE_1;
01978                         pSoldier->fPauseAim = FALSE;
01979                   }
01980                   else
01981                   {
01982                         pSoldier->bShownAimTime                   = REFINE_KNIFE_1;
01983                         pSoldier->fPauseAim = FALSE;
01984 
01985                   }
01986                   // Reset counter
01987                   RESETCOUNTER( NONGUNTARGETREFINE );
01988                   break;
01989 
01990             case TOSSCURS:
01991 
01992                   //BeginAimCubeUI( pSoldier, sGridNo, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel, 0, 0 );
01993                   //break;
01994 
01995             default:
01996 
01997                   // GOTO DIRECTLY TO USING ITEM
01998                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = CA_MERC_SHOOT;
01999       }
02000 
02001 }

02006 void HandleRightClickAdjustCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 usMapPos )
02007 {
02008   UINT16                            usInHand;
02009       INT16                         sAPCosts;
02010       INT8                          bFutureAim;
02011       UINT8                         ubCursor;
02012       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTSoldier;
02013       INT16                         sGridNo;
02014       INT8                          bTargetLevel;
02015 
02016 
02017       usInHand = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
02018 
02019       ubCursor =  GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier );
02020 
02021       UINT8 maxAimLevels = AllowedAimingLevels(pSoldier);
02022 
02023       // 'snap' cursor to target tile....
02024       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
02025       {
02026             usMapPos = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
02027       }
02028 
02029 
02030       switch( ubCursor )
02031       {
02032             case TARGETCURS:
02033             
02034                   // CHECK IF GUY HAS IN HAND A WEAPON
02035                   if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst && !pSoldier->bDoAutofire)
02036                   {
02037                         // Do nothing!
02038                         // pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_AIM_BURST;
02039                   }
02040                   else if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire)
02041                   {
02042                         INT16 sCurAPCosts;
02043       
02044                         if(pSoldier->autofireLastStep)
02045                         {
02046                               pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;                                  //reset the bullet counter
02047                               pSoldier->autofireLastStep = FALSE;
02048                               return;
02049                         }
02050 
02051 
02052                         if(pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft > pSoldier->bDoAutofire )
02053                         {
02054                               //Calculate how many bullets we need to fire to add at least one more AP
02055                               sAPCosts = sCurAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, 0);
02056                               while(EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) && sAPCosts <= sCurAPCosts && pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft > pSoldier->bDoAutofire)  //Increment the bullet count until we run out of APs or we spend the whole AP
02057                               {
02058                                     pSoldier->bDoAutofire++;
02059                                     sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, 0);
02060                               }
02061 
02062                               //we've stepped over the border and used up one more ap, now let's make sure that it is spent to maximize the bullets
02063 
02064                               sCurAPCosts = sAPCosts;
02065 
02066                               do
02067                               {
02068                                     pSoldier->bDoAutofire++;
02069                                     sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, 0);
02070                               }
02071                               while(EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) && sAPCosts == sCurAPCosts && pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft >= pSoldier->bDoAutofire);
02072                               pSoldier->bDoAutofire--;
02073 
02074                               sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, 0);
02075 
02076                               if(!EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ))           //We've not enough points to fire those bullets
02077                               {
02078                                     pSoldier->autofireLastStep = TRUE;
02079                                     pSoldier->bDoAutofire--;
02080                               }
02081                               else
02082                                     pSoldier->autofireLastStep = FALSE; //both last step conditions are false
02083                         }
02084                         else
02085                         {
02086                               pSoldier->autofireLastStep = TRUE;
02087                         }
02088                   }
02089                   else
02090                   {
02091                         sGridNo                             = usMapPos;
02092                         bTargetLevel        = (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel;
02093 
02094                         // Look for a target here...
02095                         if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
02096                         {
02097                               // Get target soldier, if one exists
02098                               pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
02099                               sGridNo = pTSoldier->sGridNo;
02100                               bTargetLevel = pSoldier->bLevel;
02101 
02102                               if ( !HandleCheckForBadChangeToGetThrough( pSoldier, pTSoldier, sGridNo , bTargetLevel ) )
02103                               {
02104                                     return;
02105                               }
02106                         }
02107 
02108                         bFutureAim = (INT8)( pSoldier->bShownAimTime + 1 );
02109 
02110                         if ( bFutureAim <= maxAimLevels )
02111                         {
02112                               sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, (INT8)(bFutureAim ) );
02113 
02114                               // Determine if we can afford!
02115                               if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) )
02116                               {
02117                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime+= 1;
02118                                     if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime > maxAimLevels )
02119                                     {
02120                                           pSoldier->bShownAimTime = maxAimLevels;
02121                                     }
02122                               }
02123                               // Else - goto first level!
02124                               else
02125                               {
02126                                     if ( !gfDisplayFullCountRing )
02127                                     {
02128                                           gfDisplayFullCountRing = TRUE;
02129                                     }
02130                                     else
02131                                     {
02132                                           pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_AIM_1;
02133                                           gfDisplayFullCountRing = FALSE;
02134                                     }
02135                               }
02136                         }
02137                         else
02138                         {
02139                               if ( !gfDisplayFullCountRing )
02140                               {
02141                                     gfDisplayFullCountRing = TRUE;
02142                               }
02143                               else
02144                               {
02145                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_AIM_1;
02146                                     gfDisplayFullCountRing = FALSE;
02147                               }
02148                         }
02149                   }
02150                   break;
02151 
02152 
02153             case PUNCHCURS:
02154             
02155                   bFutureAim = (INT8)( pSoldier->bShownAimTime + REFINE_PUNCH_2 );
02156 
02157                   if ( bFutureAim <= REFINE_PUNCH_2 )
02158                   {
02159                         sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, (INT8)(bFutureAim / 2) );
02160 
02161                         // Determine if we can afford!
02162                         if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) )
02163                         {
02164                               pSoldier->bShownAimTime+= REFINE_PUNCH_2;
02165 
02166                               if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime > REFINE_PUNCH_2 )
02167                               {
02168                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_PUNCH_2;
02169                               }
02170                         }
02171                         // Else - goto first level!
02172                         else
02173                         {
02174                               if ( !gfDisplayFullCountRing )
02175                               {
02176                                     gfDisplayFullCountRing = TRUE;
02177                               }
02178                               else
02179                               {
02180                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_PUNCH_1;
02181                                     gfDisplayFullCountRing = FALSE;
02182                               }
02183                         }
02184                   }
02185                   else
02186                   {
02187                         if ( !gfDisplayFullCountRing )
02188                         {
02189                               gfDisplayFullCountRing = TRUE;
02190                         }
02191                         else
02192                         {
02193                               pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_PUNCH_1;
02194                               gfDisplayFullCountRing = FALSE;
02195                         }
02196                   }
02197                   break;
02198 
02199 
02200             case KNIFECURS:
02201             
02202                   bFutureAim = (INT8)( pSoldier->bShownAimTime + REFINE_KNIFE_2 );
02203 
02204                   if ( bFutureAim <= REFINE_KNIFE_2 )
02205                   {
02206                         sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, (INT8)(bFutureAim / 2) );
02207 
02208                         // Determine if we can afford!
02209                         if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) )
02210                         {
02211                               pSoldier->bShownAimTime+= REFINE_KNIFE_2;
02212 
02213                               if ( pSoldier->bShownAimTime > REFINE_KNIFE_2 )
02214                               {
02215                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_KNIFE_2;
02216                               }
02217                         }
02218                         // Else - goto first level!
02219                         else
02220                         {
02221                               if ( !gfDisplayFullCountRing )
02222                               {
02223                                     gfDisplayFullCountRing = TRUE;
02224                               }
02225                               else
02226                               {
02227                                     pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_KNIFE_1;
02228                                     gfDisplayFullCountRing = FALSE;
02229                               }
02230                         }
02231                   }
02232                   else
02233                   {
02234                         if ( !gfDisplayFullCountRing )
02235                         {
02236                               gfDisplayFullCountRing = TRUE;
02237                         }
02238                         else
02239                         {
02240                               pSoldier->bShownAimTime = REFINE_KNIFE_1;
02241                               gfDisplayFullCountRing = FALSE;
02242                         }
02243                   }
02244                   break;
02245 
02246             case TOSSCURS:
02247 
02248                   //IncrementAimCubeUI( );
02249                   break;
02250 
02251             default:
02252 
02253                   ErasePath( TRUE );
02254 
02255       }
02256
