02258 
02259 
02260 UINT8 GetActionModeCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02261 {
02262       UINT8                         ubCursor;
02263   UINT16                      usInHand;
02264 
02265       // If we are an EPC, do nothing....
02266       //if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
02267       //{
02268       //    return( INVALIDCURS );
02269       //}
02270 
02271       // AN EPC is always not - attackable unless they are a robot!
02272       if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT ) )
02273       {
02274             return( INVALIDCURS );
02275       }
02276 
02277       // ATE: if a vehicle.... same thing
02278       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02279       {
02280             return( INVALIDCURS );
02281       }
02282 
02283       // If we can't be controlled, returninvalid...
02284       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
02285       {
02286             if ( !CanRobotBeControlled( pSoldier ) )
02287             {
02288                   // Display message that robot cannot be controlled....
02289                   return( INVALIDCURS );
02290             }
02291       }
02292 
02293 
02294       // If we are in attach shoot mode, use toss cursor...
02295       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL )
02296       {
02297             return( TRAJECTORYCURS );
02298       }
02299       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_BURST && Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].grenadelauncher ) )
02300       {
02301             if ( gGameSettings.fOptions [ TOPTION_GL_BURST_CURSOR ] )
02302                   return( TARGETCURS );
02303             else
02304                   return ( TRAJECTORYCURS );    
02305       }
02306       if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO || ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_AUTOFIRE && Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].grenadelauncher ) )
02307       {
02308             if ( gGameSettings.fOptions [ TOPTION_GL_BURST_CURSOR ] )
02309                   return( TARGETCURS );
02310             else
02311                   return ( TRAJECTORYCURS );    
02312       }
02313 
02314       usInHand = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
02315 
02316       // Start off with what is in our hand
02317       ubCursor = Item[ usInHand ].ubCursor;
02318 
02319       // OK, check if what is in our hands has a detonator attachment...
02320       // Detonators can only be on invalidcurs things...
02321       if ( ubCursor == INVALIDCURS )
02322       {
02323             if ( IsDetonatorAttached( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) ) )
02324             {
02325                   ubCursor = BOMBCURS;
02326             }
02327             else if ( IsRemoteDetonatorAttached( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) ) )
02328             {
02329                   ubCursor = BOMBCURS;
02330             }
02331       }
02332 
02333       // Now check our terrain to see if we cannot do the action now...
02334       if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
02335       {
02336             ubCursor = INVALIDCURS;
02337       }
02338 
02339       // If we are out of breath, no cursor...
02340       if ( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH && pSoldier->bCollapsed )
02341       {
02342             ubCursor = INVALIDCURS;
02343       }
02344 
02345       return( ubCursor );
02346 }
02347 
02348 // Switch on item, display appropriate feedback cursor for a click....
02349 void HandleUICursorRTFeedback( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02350 {
02351       UINT8 ubItemCursor;
02352 
02353       ubItemCursor  =  GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier );
02354 
02355       switch( ubItemCursor )
02356       {
02357             case TARGETCURS:
02358 
02359                   if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
02360                   {
02361                         //BeginDisplayTimedCursor( ACTION_TARGETREDBURST_UICURSOR, 500 );
02362                   }
02363                   else
02364                   {
02365                         if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
02366                         {
02367                               BeginDisplayTimedCursor( RED_THROW_UICURSOR, 500 );
02368                         }
02369                         else
02370                         {
02371                               BeginDisplayTimedCursor( ACTION_TARGETRED_UICURSOR, 500 );
02372                         }
02373                   }
02374                   break;
02375 
02376             default:
02377 
02378                   break;
02379       }
